game.title: Lost Expedition
game.objective: Find the lost expedition and return them safely to the base camp.
game.description: A group of scientists went missing on an expedition to explore a nearby cave system. Their last communication was that they had found something interesting, but since then there has been no contact. The player must find the lost scientists and bring them back to the base camp alive.
game.reward: 200 gold pieces and a magical healing potion

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the cave system
tasks.description: Talk to the local guide, Old Man Thorne, and he will give you a map that leads to the cave entrance.

tasks.objective: Explore the caves and find the lost scientists
tasks.description: Use your map and explore the cave system. Be careful, as there are many dangers lurking in the darkness.

tasks.objective: Rescue the scientists and return them to the base camp
tasks.description: Find the lost scientists and bring them back to the base camp. Be careful, as they may be injured or traumatized.
